name: Toy Terror
description:
What a week!

In just 7 days, 4 complete newcomers made a game! Not a single person in our group had ever made a game before. But that did not stop us to create Toy Terror, a game about a small tin windup robot, that has to rewind its gears every now and then.
It was lots of fun and we hope, you enjoy it, too!

Controls:
W: Jump
A/D: Walk
Space: Rewind

Audio by: SeppiFails
Graphics by: Jay
Code by: Noctus Rex/Cyklan

Stuff we used:

Clock face by Freepic
Conveyour belt sound effect by n Beats
Windup sound: Free Sound Library
